detail_desc: Tailored shorts in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Short jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, unlined drawstring hood and a zip at the top. Yoke, front pockets with a press-stud, and elastication at the hem and cuffs. Lined.
Balconette bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric. Round opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and short, elasticated puff sleeves.
Long dress in an airy weave containing glittery threads in a narrow cut at the top with a small frilled collar with a tie at the neck, opening at the front and a flared, tiered skirt. Lined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck front and back, and wide tie-top shoulder straps.

Blouse in fluted fabric made from a cotton and viscose blend with a collar, V-shaped opening at the front, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined halterneck swimsuit in a narrow cut at the front with ties at the back of the neck. Open back and deep opening at the front with frill-trimmed edges.

Top in sturdy cotton sweatshirt fabric with a slightly wider neckline that has a wide-ribbed, asymmetric trim. Boxy style with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide-ribbed trims at the cuffs and hem.
Non-wired push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. High waist with a wide waist panel.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Three-strand necklace with thin metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length 32-40 cm.
Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative seam at the front and metal rings at the top. Imitation leather linings and insoles.

Corset in lace and mesh with a padded bra. Bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Suspenders at the bottom.
Short, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a round neck, elasticated seam at the waist and wrapover back with a cut-out section. Lined.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with a slit.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and a frill at the waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-layered, fine-knit hat with lace ears and a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Baby Exclusive. Wrapover dressing gown in a soft organic cotton knit with a hood and striped jersey lining.
V-neck top in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Push-up bra in microfibre and big hole mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back.
Beret in fine-knit wool containing some nylon.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed turtle neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Metal hoop earrings, some plain and some with a textured finish. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a lace section over the shoulders and a wide neckline with gathers front and back.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Elasticated metal bracelets.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with smocking at the top, short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Romper suit in a cotton weave with flounced shoulder straps, buttons down the front, elastication at the top of the back and elasticated hems.
Dance leotard in glossy jersey with crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist and a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.
Cardigan in soft, patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shimmering metallic imitation leather sandals with an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
V-neck body in airy jersey with a slight sheen. Gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves and gentle draping at the front. Seam at the waist and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Fine-knit liner socks designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have a ribbed section in the middle of the foot and elastication around the openings for optimum comfort.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles, and chunky soles.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, draping at the top and seams with braided trims under the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a silicone trim at the top to hold the dress in place. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in airy viscose jersey with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Hi-top trainers in a patterned, fully-fashioned knit with details in soft plastic, wide elastication at the top and lacing at the front. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Fitted top in crinkled jersey with a square neckline front and back and short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Waist bag in woven fabric with a zip at the front and a wide, adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Size 6x11.5x22 cm.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Cargo joggers in washed stretch cotton twill in a relaxed fit with concealed elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Patch front pockets, back pockets and flap leg pockets. Fake fly, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and beaded appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulder seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Umbrella in transparent, printed plastic with a plastic handle. Length 77 cm.
A-line dress in a patterned cotton weave with an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke with gathers front and back and short, flounced sleeves with a tasselled trim. Lined.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and lace details and a fastening at the back.
Short dungaree dress in cotton corduroy with a zip and concealed button at one side, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket and decorative front pockets.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
V-neck strappy top in ribbed jersey with buttons down the front.
Fitted off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck and long sleeves.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening with ties at the front. Pleats at the top and a straight-cut hem.

Short beach dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck front and back with a crocheted lace trim, horizontal, tasselled straps at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in a soft, chunky knit with a polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Woven cotton blouse in a shorter style with a V-neck and concealed fastener at the front, low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and wide, sewn-on ties at the waist.
